title: Demonic Visions: 50 Horror Tales #3
description: Welcome to the third installment of the Demonic Visions series. This new collection of macabre tales includes short fiction by members of the Demonic Visions team. Every new book that we publish will take you deeper into the minds of these talented writers, and acquaint you with their various styles of prose. So enjoy, and I hope that you will join us for the entire Demonic Visions saga which is intended to last many, many years and span many, many volumes...
author: Chris Robertson
